My package is to designed to work on common endocrinologial sea turtle data which often times includes:GPA coordinates of nests, reproductive output, carapace length, and the concentrations of various biomarkers.   

My package to work with the recording of nesting sea turtle data. This includes, GPA coordinates, steroid concentration, and reproductive output.
